settings.text: A drug called Tylenol PM is used to treat pain and promote sleep in patients. It contains both the analgesic acetaminophen and the antihistamine diphenhydramine. The drug blocks pain signals coming from the brain and also makes you sleepy. There is no prescription needed to buy Tylenol PM over-the-counter. In order to prevent taking too much of the medication and experiencing negative side effects, it is crucial to carefully follow the instructions on the package. In order to better understand Tylenol PM, this article is meant to provide information to Welzo users.

Tylenol blocks pain signals coming from the brain and also makes you sleepy. It contains both the analgesic acetaminophen and the antihistamine diphenhydramine. The drug can be purchased without a prescription over-the-counter.

-Tylenol PM is a drug that helps people fall asleep while treating pain.

-It contains both the analgesic acetaminophen and the antihistamine diphenhydramine.

The drug blocks pain signals coming from the brain and also makes you drowsy, which is how it works.

-Tylenol PM can be purchased without a prescription and is available over-the-counter.

Symptoms of Tylenol PM

-The most frequent side effects of Tylenol PM are headache, dizziness, and dry mouth.

-More severe side effects are uncommon but can include allergic reaction or liver damage.

-To avoid taking too much of the medication and experiencing negative side effects, it's crucial to carefully follow the directions on the package.

Tylenol PM is typically regarded as safe when used as recommended. If you have any medical conditions, are pregnant, breastfeeding, or are taking any other medications, it is crucial to consult your doctor before taking the medication. This is because Tylenol PM may not be safe for everyone and may interact with other medications.
